segments.text: Excuse me , but are you Mr . Smith from Britain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm from Textile Import and Export Corporation . I've come to meet you . My name is Zhang Yong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do , Mr . Zhang ? I'm glad to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you do , Mr . Smith ? Let me help you with your luggage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you have a good trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On the whole , not too bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anyhow , it's a long way to China , isn't it ? And I think you must be very tired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am , rather . But I'll be all right by tomorrow and ready for business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish you a pleasant stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , Mr . Smith , if all is ready , we'd better start for the hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This way , please . Our car is waiting over there .
segments.speaker: S1
